LanguageData.RT_M48H_MediumTank.label: M48H Medium Tank
LanguageData.RT_M48H_MediumTank.description: A medium MBT from a by-gone era, designed for use in jungle and mountainous encounters. After undergoing a modern refit, it was mass-produced for the televised "Iron Fists" Equipped with a 105 mm cannon and two 7.62 mm machine gun armaments.
